meanings.sent1: She often miscalculates the total cost of groceries.
meanings.sent2: He miscalculates the time it takes to finish his homework.
meanings.sent3: The robot miscalculates the distance and bumps into walls.
meanings.sent4: The detective miscalculates the suspect's alibi and solves the case.
meanings.sent5: The student miscalculates the answer but learns from the mistake.

meanings.definition: To make a mistake in calculating.
meanings.sent1: The chef miscalculates the recipe and adds too much salt.
meanings.sent2: They miscalculate the budget for the project and run out of funds.
meanings.sent3: The cat miscalculates the jump and lands on the table instead of the chair.
meanings.sent4: The captain miscalculates the route and gets lost at sea.
meanings.sent5: The scientist miscalculates the data but discovers a new pattern.
